    Duke Hotel Sdn Bhd Vacancy for HR Manager

    November 18, 2020

    TOC

    • Positions
    • Qualifications
    • How To Apply

    Duke Hotel pre-opening which schedule to open in November 2021 is currently looking for suitable person to fill in a HR Manager position.

    Positions

    Come & explore an opportunity in hospitality with Duke Hotel. We invite kind & aspiring talents to join us Human Resource Manager

    Qualifications

    • Looking for someone who has pre-opening hotel experience.
    • To coordinate and ensure correct selection, recruitment, training, develooment and administration of human resources are in order
    • To achieve business objectives, according to the local labour law and follow the HR policies. Also nave to maintain and promote good work relations, employee Satisfaction and a good working environment.
    • Any other tasks as required by the Management from time to time.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Interested candidate may send latest updated resume and portfolio to DHSB.HRM@GMAIL.COM NOT LATER THAN 15 DECEMBER 2020
